statements: SELECT * FROM performance_data WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM performance_data WHERE performance_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM performance_data WHERE department = 'Marketing';
SELECT employee_name, performance_rating FROM performance_data WHERE performance_rating BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT employee_id, performance_date FROM performance_data WHERE performance_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM performance_data WHERE performance_rating >= 4 ORDER BY employee_name ASC, performance_rating DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM performance_data WHERE department = 'Human Resources' ORDER BY performance_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT employee_name, department, performance_rating FROM performance_data WHERE performance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY department ASC, employee_name DESC
SELECT DISTINCT department FROM performance_data WHERE performance_rating < 3
SELECT employee_name, performance_date FROM performance_data WHERE employee_name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY performance_date ASC
SELECT * FROM performance_data ORDER BY performance_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, performance_score FROM performance_data WHERE performance_score > 80;
SELECT * FROM performance_data WHERE performance_score < 50 ORDER BY employee_id ASC;
SELECT employee_id, reward_type, reward_date FROM employee_rewards WHERE employee_id = 1001;
SELECT DISTINCT employee_id FROM performance_data;
SELECT * FROM performance_data WHERE employee_id = 100 ORDER BY performance_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT employee_id, performance_score, performance_date FROM performance_data WHERE performance_score > 9.0;
SELECT * FROM performance_data INNER JOIN employee_rewards ON performance_data.employee_id = employee_rewards.employee_id;
SELECT DISTINCT employee_id, reward_type FROM employee_rewards WHERE reward_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(reward_type) AS reward_count FROM employee_rewards GROUP BY employee_id HAVING reward_count > 3 ORDER BY reward_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, salary, rating FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, salary, rating FROM employees WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT employee_name, performance_score, performance_date FROM performance_metrics JOIN employees ON performance_metrics.employee_id = employees.employee_id;
SELECT employee_name, salary FROM employees WHERE salary > 50000 ORDER BY salary DESC
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, rating FROM employees WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY rating ASC
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE performance_score BETWEEN 80 AND 90 ORDER BY performance_date DESC
SELECT employee_name, reward_description FROM employees INNER JOIN rewards ON employees.employee_id = rewards.employee_id WHERE rewards.reward_date = '2022-09-15'
SELECT employee_name, salary, reward_description FROM employees LEFT JOIN rewards ON employees.employee_id = rewards.employee_id
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, performance_score FROM employees ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM performance_data WHERE performance_score > 80;
SELECT employee_name, recognition_type FROM employees JOIN recognition ON employees.employee_id = recognition.employee_id;
SELECT employee_name, reward_name, reward_date FROM employees JOIN rewards ON employees.employee_id = rewards.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY employee_name DESC, performance_score ASC
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE performance_score > 80 AND department = 'HR'
SELECT DISTINCT department, COUNT(employee_id) AS total_employees FROM employees GROUP BY department
SELECT e.employee_name, p.performance_score FROM employees e JOIN performance_data p ON e.employee_id = p.employee_id AND p.performance_score > 90
SELECT r.employee_id, r.reward_name, r.reward_date, e.employee_name FROM rewards r JOIN employees e ON r.employee_id = e.employee_id
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM employees WHERE department_id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, performance_score FROM employees ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM performance_reviews WHERE review_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, recognition_type FROM employees INNER JOIN recognition ON employees.employee_id = recognition.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department_id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, performance_score FROM employees ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT employee_name, review_date, performance_rating FROM employees JOIN performance_reviews ON employees.employee_id = performance_reviews.employee_id;
SELECT department_name, COUNT(*) AS total_employees FROM employees JOIN departments ON employees.department_id = departments.department_id GROUP BY department_name;
SELECT recognition_type, COUNT(*) AS total_recognitions FROM employees JOIN recognition ON employees.employee_id = recognition.employee_id GROUP BY recognition_type ORDER BY total_recognitions DESC;
